title.rendered: Zhoushan Putuoshan Airport in Zhoushan/Putuoshan, China Address / Phone / Email

content.rendered:
Zhoushan Putuoshan Airport in Zhoushan/Putuoshan, China Address / Phone / Email / Location / Website

Address:

Zhoushan Putuoshan Airport, Putuo, Zhoushan, China

Working hours

Phone: +86 580 626 0716

Email:

Fax:

Zhoushan Putuoshan Airport Website: http://www.zsairport.com.cn

Zhoushan Putuoshan Airport IATA code: HSN

Zhoushan Putuoshan Airport ICAO code: ZSZS

Airlines and destinations

View the list of airlines arriving and departing from Zhoushan Putuoshan Airport in China. Click the link to get the airline offices around the world and their address, phone number, fax, email, website, baggage allowance, online check-in details, special assistance details and more.

List of Airlines arrival and departure Destinations

China Express Airlines Chongqing, Fuyang
China Southern Airlines Lianyungang, Shenzhen
China United Airlines Beijing–Nanyuan, Foshan
Fuzhou Airlines Fuzhou, Tianjin
Joy Air Hefei, Zhengzhou
Shandong Airlines Jinan, Qingdao, Quanzhou, Xiamen
Shenzhen Airlines Guangzhou, Quanzhou
Xiamen Airlines Beijing–Capital, Quanzhou, Xiamen
